rigakuXRD 0.2.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Reads the RAS Rigaku XRD data

    xrd.read.RAS.Rd

    Reads the RAS Rigaku XRD data

    xrd.read.RAS(filename)

    Arguments

    filename

    filename including path

    Value

    data frame with XRD data

    Examples

    
filename = dir(xrd.getSamplePath(),patter='ras$')[1]
fname = file.path(xrd.getSamplePath(), filename)
d = xrd.read.RAS(fname)
